name: CSViz
description: Simple geo data viz for CSV files

scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js main.js -t [ reactify --extension js --harmony ] | node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -mc > build/bundle.js
scripts.uglify-css: cp build/bundle.css build/.bundle.css && rm build/bundle.css && node_modules/.bin/uglifycss build/.bundle.css > build/bundle.css && rm build/.bundle.css
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run lib && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run uglify-css
scripts.watch: npm run lib && npm run browser-sync & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master && git pull && cp -r data/tmpData/ data && git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'gh-pages update' && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master

author: Wiredcraft
